text: Guy Bedos (15 June 1934 – 28 May 2020) was a French actor and comedian. He was born in Algiers. He was best known for his roles in Sweet and Sour, Pardon Mon Affaire, Too! and All Together. He was also famous for his left-wing political support and he had supported politicians such as François Mitterrand.
